about_the_game:
Valentine Desire More Hearts Edition is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Valentines theme oriented from left to right.

Free game feature is awarded when 3 or more scatters appear on any line and is awarded 8 free games.
During free games any (6) six or more Hearts Cash values on screen trigger the Hearts Cash Feature.
During normal play any (6) six or more More Hearts ( Symbols ) scattered anywhere on screen start the Hearts Cash Feature.
During the Hearts Cash Feature there will be 3 free spins, when an additional Hearts value lands on screen it will re-trigger free spins back to 3
until no more Hearts land on screen, win Mini, Minor and Major jackpots when symbols land on screen.

To Win Grand Jackpot screen needs to have all 15 reels lite up with a winning value.
Scattered during Free spins paid or free cannot be retriggered during play.
Spelling L-O-V-E-R on any lite line gives 10000 Coins.

If a 5 of a kind is won with 10x Symbol the amount won is multilplied by 10.

Features:
keyboard Shortcuts.
Supports Mouse, keyboard.
Spacebar = Spin

This is the closest slot machine simulation you can get to the real thing, with features like, Reserve Button, Call Attendant, Collect and Paytable.
Play Pokies4fun Slot Simulations at work or at home without losing a cent, Great Games Great Fun........

No real money can be won.
For Amusement Only.
